title: terms and definitions list?
body: not sure if its really needed or not but it may be worthwhile to pin up a post explaining a list of the less commonly known abbreviations (is that the right word to use?)

replies.body:
Got one.
Will link later on.

http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=445109

Here. I once had to translate all of this for the Italian community, so it was easy to find the link ;) There's a few missing and it might not be up to date, so... if needed, ask :P

Do you mean in game terms like MIA, leash, etc?

Or forum ones like TFW?
